project_abstract.cdata: The proposed credit would finance the foreign exchange costs of: (a) a five-year (1968-72) highway maintenance program; and (b) consultants' services comprising (i) a feasibility study, including preliminary engineering, of the 82 km long Djermaya-Djimtilo road, (ii) detailed engineering of the same road if the economic justification of construction is confirmed by the feasibility study, and (iii) other consultants' services regarding highways.
